intro: Psychotria hivaoana, commonly known as the Hivaoa Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant native to Madagascar. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes many species with ornamental and medicinal value. The plant is characterized by its dark green, leathery leaves and clusters of small, white or pale pink flowers. It typically grows in humid, shaded environments within the rainforest understory. Psychotria hivaoana is of interest to botanists due to its unique morphology and potential ecological role in its native habitat.
